name: Tesla Plaid Pattern x 3
description:
3 Plaid patterns.


First one is a flat one created based on the picture with the Model S plaid in it. I basically took 1 wall, and recreated the pattern in a flat way.


Second one attempts to recreate the Plaid corridor. Sadly there is no non-destructive way to do a perspective transform in Figma. So I had to use a plugin called 'Mockup' to distort the first pattern into the shape of the 4 walls. This method is destructive and the walls are no longer vector.


Third pattern is the badge on the Plaid cars during the first delivery event.
